item.title: About me
item.description: Welcome! A proficient Software Engineer with 12+ years of experience and a track record of delivering quality solutions using a range of different technologies. Dirty hands on Software Development, Systems Integration, and tons of open source tools. Deep understanding to software concepts like automation, databases, CICD, mobile & web development, cloud & cloud native architectures, data science & AI and more. ITIL3®, ISTQB®, Applied Data Science Some History Ericsson, Sweden — Microservices Architect
